verse: श्रद्धाभक्त्योरभावेऽपि भगवन्नामसंकीर्तनं समस्तं दुरितं नाशयतीत्युक्तम् किम पुनः श्रद्धाभक्तिपूर्वकं। (शंकराचार्य)
meaning: श्रद्धाभक्त्योरभावे अपि भगवन् नामसंकीर्तनं समस्तं दुरितं नाशयति इति उक्तम्। किम पुनः श्रद्धाभक्तिपूर्वकं। Meaning:In the absence of faith and devotion, it is said that chanting the name of the Lord eradicates all sins. Then, what need is there for faith and devotion?Breakdown:Explanation:The verse is attributed to Shankaracharya and it questions the purpose of having faith and devotion when it is said that chanting the name of the Lord can destroy all sins, even without them. It raises the question of whether faith and devotion are necessary if chanting alone can achieve the desired result.
